recipes.rbenv::system_install: Configures a node with a system wide rbenv and ruby_build installation accessible by users in the rbenv group
recipes.rbenv::ruby_build: Installs ruby_build to a node which enables rbenv the ability to install and manage versions of Ruby
recipes.rbenv::ohai_plugin: Installs an rbenv Ohai plugin onto the node to automatically populate attributes about the rbenv installation
